message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $11,500.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make sure it's a good value for me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000 to make this deal work.  I believe this price still gives you a great deal on this valuable product.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,500 and $11,000, so I'm offering $10,750. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,750. Let's split the difference again. I'm offering $10,875. This price is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,750 and $10,875, so I'm offering $10,812.50. I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
Bob, I see we're getting closer to an agreement. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time. I'm offering $10,843.75.  This is a good price for both of us, and I hope we can finalize the deal.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm afraid I've reached my budget limit. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but no more. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
